1387880.name: Fantasy Grounds - Devin Night Token Pack 140: Heroic Characters 27
1387880.description:
Devin Night Token Pack 140: Heroic Characters 27

Need some variety for your group's next visit to the halls of heroes recruiting center or next hang out at the Heroic Arms Tavern? This pack has you covered! 36 tokens of multiple races and genders in various poses are eager to join your next session. Whether you need a Half Elf Assassin, Tiefling Bard, or Turtle Monk this pack delivers! Add a refreshing change to the regular line of up tavern patrons and heroes looking for adventuring companions!
This product contains:
  • Female Elven Druid
  • Female Fae Winter Witch
  • Female Fairy Adventurer
  • Female Half Elf Commander
  • Female Half Elf Ranger
  • Female Halfling Sorceress
  • Female Tengu Rogue
  • Female Tiefling Ranger
  • Male Aquatic Youth
  • 3 Male Dark Elf Combat Mages
  • Male Drow Warlock
  • Male Elf Barbarian
  • Male Elf Sorcerer
  • Male Elven Druid Hawk
  • Male Firbolg Cleric
  • Male Gnome Wizard
  • Male Goliath Berserker
  • Male Goliath Stalker
  • Male Half Orc Fighter
  • Male Half-Elf Assassin
  • Male Half-Elf Monk
  • Male Half Giant Barbarian
  • Male Panda Adventurer
  • Male Ravenfolk Rogue
  • Male Revenant Oathbreaker
  • Male Tiefling Bard
  • Male Tiefling Gunslinger
  • Male Tiefling Rogue
  • Male Tiger Scout
  • Male Turtle Fighter
  • 2 Male Turtle Monks
  • 2 Male Turtle Shamans
Adapted for Fantasy Grounds by:  
James Holloway
Requires: The free Fantasy Grounds virtual tabletop (VTT) software and any ruleset. Compatible with Fantasy Grounds Unity
